item.title: 摩根士丹利迈克-威尔逊谈股票 "救生艇 "的风险
item.description:
增长放缓可能对它们造成打击

。【原文：

A growth slowdown could hit them all

】

item.title: 摩根大通称国债流动性好于交易员预期
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co：别担心，全球最大债券市场的流动性正在恢复。【原文：For investors watching US Treasuries for signs of renewed turmoil, JPMorgan Chase & Co. has some advice: Don’t worry, liquidity in the world’s biggest bond market is on the mend.】

item.title: 如果罢工继续，埃克森可能不得不关闭法国炼油厂
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp.【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. said it may have to halt its Gravenchon refinery in northern France if strike action continues.】

item.title: 埃克森签署向韩国电池巨头供应锂的协议
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司（Exxon Mobil Corp. ）签署了一项初步协议，将向韩国电池制造商 SK On Co. 公司供应其在阿肯色州开发的矿床所产的锂，从而加深了这家石油巨头与快速发展的电动汽车行业的联系。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. signed a preliminary agreement to supply South Korean battery-maker SK On Co. with lithium from a deposit it’s developing in Arkansas, deepening the oil major’s connections to the rapidly growing electric-vehicle industry.】

item.title: 亿万富翁威斯的 Brait 计划在三年内结束投资组合
item.description: Brait SE 是一家南非投资控股公司，由亿万富翁克里斯托-维斯（Christo Wiese）支持，预计将在未来 18 个月至三年内出售其现有投资组合，并将资金返还给投资者。【原文：Brait SE, a South African investment holding company backed by billionaire Christo Wiese, expects to sell its current portfolio in the next 18 months to three years and return money to investors.】

item.title: 史蒂夫-艾斯曼称 Nvidia 的故事将持续多年
item.description: 对 Neuberger Berman Group 的 Steve Eisman 来说，过去三个交易日人工智能宠儿英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：A $430 billion sell-off over the past three trading days in artificial intelligence darling Nvidia Corp. is no more than a blip to Neuberger Berman Group’s Steve Eisman.】

item.title: 麦吉尼斯警告：欧盟国家面临破坏银行业联盟推进工作的风险
item.description: 一位高级官员周二警告说，欧盟推动银行一体化的努力有可能被各国政府相互冲突的计划所淹没，从而降低银行联盟的吸引力。【原文：A European Union push to integrate its banks is at risk of being subsumed by conflicting plans by national governments that would make a banking union less attractive, a senior official warned Tuesday.】

item.title: 纽约 MTA 将详细介绍暂停收费如何挤压运营预算
item.description: 纽约市交通局警告说，在州长凯西-霍楚尔（Kathy Hochul）暂停将数十亿资金投入交通基础设施的拥堵收费计划后，其运营预算将面临财务压力。【原文：New York City’s transit agency is warning of financial pressures to its operating budget after Governor Kathy Hochul’s paused a congestion pricing plan that would have directed billions to transit infrastructure.】

item.title: 信息技术故障导致德国电价飙升至 22 个月新高
item.description: 周二，欧洲最大电力交易所的信息技术故障导致德国电力价格飙升至 2022 年 8 月以来的最高点。【原文：An IT glitch on Europe’s biggest power exchange caused the German power price to jump to the highest since August 2022 on Tuesday.】

item.title: Bybit 现已成为全球第二大加密货币交易所
item.description: 根据加密货币研究公司 Kaiko 的一份报告，Bybit 在 3 月份超过 Coinbase，成为仅次于 Binance 的全球第二大加密货币交易所。【原文：Bybit surpassed Coinbase in March to become the world’s second-largest cryptocurrency exchange after Binance, according to a report from crypto research firm Kaiko.】

item.title: 西班牙将橄榄油纳入增值税免税范围，有效期至 9 月 30 日
item.description: 西班牙将免征橄榄油增值税，作为更广泛的通胀缓解方案的一部分。【原文：Spain will exempt olive oil from paying value-added tax as part of a broader inflation-relief package.】

item.title: 埃及计划进口 12 亿美元能源以结束断电状况
item.description: 埃及已拨款 11.8 亿美元用于额外的能源进口，以求在 7 月底之前消除计划中的停电现象，并解决因气温飙升而给数百万人带来痛苦的问题。【原文：Egypt has allocated $1.18 billion for extra energy imports as it seeks to eliminate scheduled power cuts before the end of July and tackle an issue that’s causing misery for millions as temperatures soar.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行在旅游业回暖之际出售商业地产资产
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）正在出售其部分西班牙商业房地产资产，以利用旅游业大流行后的复苏清理其资产负债表。【原文：Banco Santander SA is selling part of its Spanish commercial real estate assets as it seizes on a post-pandemic resurgence in tourism to clean up its balance sheet.】

item.title: 淡水河谷出售美元债券重返全球债务市场
item.description: 淡水河谷是世界第二大铁矿石生产商，一年来首次利用国际债券市场回购债务。【原文：Vale, the world’s second largest iron-ore producer, is tapping international bond markets for the first time in a year amid a debt buyback.】

item.title: 邮轮需求不断刷新纪录，嘉年华上调业绩展望
item.description: 嘉年华集团（Carnival Corp. ）上调了全年盈利展望，此前强劲的游轮需求帮助其在上一季度实现了意外盈利。【原文：Carnival Corp. raised its full-year earnings outlook after strong demand for cruises helped it post a surprise profit last quarter.】

item.title: 拜登与特朗普的复选对美国股市意味着什么？
item.description: 墨西哥、印度和欧洲的大选引发了今年全球股市的动荡。在美国，投资者面临着与通胀、利率和地缘政治相关的不确定性，已经开始为总统竞选和 11 月大选可能带来的波动做好准备。【原文：Elections in Mexico, India and Europe have set off upheavals in global stock markets this year. In the US, investors contending with uncertainty related to inflation, interest rates and geopolitics are already bracing for volatility that could accompany the presidential campaign and November election.】

item.title: 印度亿万富翁投资者贝拉将在得克萨斯州建造化工厂
item.description: 亿万富翁库马尔-曼加拉姆-贝拉（Kumar Mangalam Birla）将投资 5000 万美元，在美国炼油地区的中心地带新建一家化工厂，以扩大其 Aditya Birla 集团在北美的业务。【原文：Billionaire Kumar Mangalam Birla is investing $50 million to build a new chemical plant in the heart of the US oil-refining region as his Aditya Birla Group expands its North American footprint.】

item.title: 联邦快递业绩将考验运输类股票的强劲走势
item.description: 周二，包裹承运商联邦快递公司（FedEx Corp. ）将公布季度财报，揭示美国经济和消费者的强劲程度，运输股的新一轮反弹将面临关键考验。【原文：A nascent rally in transportation stocks will face a crucial test on Tuesday when parcel carrier FedEx Corp. reports quarterly results that will shed light on the strength of the US economy and consumer.】

item.title: 瑞士总统希望今年达成欧盟新协议
item.description: 瑞士希望在今年结束与欧盟的新协议谈判，为这个多年来屡屡碰壁的老大难问题设定一个时间表。【原文：Switzerland wants to conclude negotiations on a new deal with the European Union this year, setting a timetable on a long-running issue that’s hit multiple hurdles over the years.】

item.title: 大卫-泰珀的卡罗莱纳黑豹队赢得 6.5 亿美元球场升级资金
item.description: 美国国家橄榄球联盟（National Football League）卡罗莱纳黑豹队和美国职业足球大联盟（Major League Soccer）夏洛特足球俱乐部（Charlotte Football Club）的所有者已获得 6.5 亿美元的公共资金，用于北卡罗来纳州夏洛特市美国银行体育场（Bank of America Stadium）价值 13 亿美元的翻新工程。【原文：The owner of the National Football League’s Carolina Panthers and Major League Soccer’s Charlotte Football Club has secured $650 million of public funds for a $1.3 billion renovation of Bank of America Stadium in Charlotte, North Carolina.】

item.title: 托兹称拜登获胜可能比特朗普更能扰乱市场
item.description: 经济史学家亚当-图兹（Adam Tooze）认为，即使乔-拜登赢得连任，美国深刻的党派分歧也有可能给市场带来不确定性。这是因为，如果拜登再次击败唐纳德-特朗普，共和党人可能会采取更激烈的行动。【原文：America’s deep partisan divide threatens to inject uncertainty into markets even if Joe Biden wins a second term, according to economic historian Adam Tooze. That’s because Republicans may lash out more should he defeat Donald Trump again.】

item.title: 彭博投资峰会聚焦人工智能对金融业的颠覆
item.description: 纽约金融区。摄影师：埃德-琼斯/法新社/盖蒂图片社【原文：New York City financial district. Photographer: Ed Jones/AFP/Getty Images】

item.title: 贡渥集团为加蓬收购石油生产商阿萨拉公司的交易提供资金支持
item.description: 大宗商品交易商贡渥集团为加蓬收购凯雷集团的阿萨拉能源公司提供了资金支持，这是独立能源交易商介入非洲产油国交易的最新例证。【原文：Commodity trader Gunvor Group helped finance Gabon’s acquisition of Carlyle Group’s Assala Energy, the latest example of independent energy traders stepping in with deals for oil-producing countries in Africa.】

item.title: 据 KTN 报道，八名抗议者在肯尼亚议会附近被枪杀
item.description: 据肯尼亚当地广播公司 KTN 援引急救部门的消息报道，在肯尼亚反政府抗议活动中，至少有 8 人丧生。【原文：At least eight people were killed in Kenya’s anti-government protests against controversial new taxes that demonstrators say are onerous for a largely poor nation, local broadcaster KTN reported, citing emergency services.】

item.title: 今日巴西五大热点话题
item.description: 根据会议记录，Copom 将中性利率假设上调至 4.75%。Gabriel Galípolo 在今天上午的一次活动中发表讲话。此外，财政部将举行固定利率后拍卖，国内税收署将公布 5 月份税收情况。铁矿石上涨。查看要点：【原文：Copom eleva hipótese de taxa neutra para 4,75%, segundo ata. Gabriel Galípolo fala em evento nesta manhã. Ainda na agenda, Tesouro faz leilão de pós-fixados e Receita divulga arrecadação de maio. Minério de ferro sobe. Veja os destaques:】

item.title: BTG 将欧洲房地产投资增加两倍，达到 10 亿欧元
item.description: 拉丁美洲最大的独立投资银行 BTG Pactual SA 银行计划在未来几年将其在欧洲的房地产投资增加两倍多，达到约 10 亿欧元（11 亿美元）。【原文：Banco BTG Pactual SA, the biggest independent investment bank in Latin America, plans to more than triple its real estate investments in Europe to about €1 billion ($1.1 billion) in coming years.】

item.title: 俄罗斯石油出口因港口工程创三个月最大降幅
item.description:
上周有四天没有货物离开普里莫尔斯克或科兹米诺

。【原文：

No cargoes left Primorsk or Kozmino for four days last week

】

item.title: 制裁俄罗斯油轮将提高莫斯科的成本
item.description:
西方行动造成的不确定性可能会促使克里姆林宫的剩余客户要求更高的折扣。【原文：

The uncertainty created by the West’s actions may prompt the Kremlin’s remaining customers to demand steeper discounts.

】

item.title: 巴西央行不急于在财政困境中再次降息
item.description: 巴西央行表示，随着经济增长速度超出预期，以及在持续的财政担忧下通胀预期升温，巴西央行不会考虑在短期内恢复货币宽松周期。【原文：Brazil central bank signaled it’s not considering resuming its monetary easing cycle any time soon as the economy grows faster than it anticipated and inflation expectations rise amid persistent fiscal concerns.】

item.title: Innovent公司的肥胖症药物与礼来公司的减肥药效果相似
item.description: 由中国创新生物公司和礼来公司共同开发的一种新型肥胖症药物在后期试验中显示出显著的减肥效果，为其在中国获批上市与诺和诺德公司的大片药物竞争铺平了道路。【原文：A new obesity drug co-developed by China’s Innovent Biologics Inc. and Eli Lilly & Co. has demonstrated significant weight loss in a late stage trial, paying the way for its approval in the country to compete with the blockbuster from Novo Nordisk A/S.】
